name: google history downloader
short_description: Ever wanted to download all your Google history and then perhaps delete it? For people who would like to download their own Google history. Simply; 1. Goto https://history.google.com/history/lookup?q=&output=rss&num=1000&start=0 and save the page as xml (its a rss feed) 2. then goto https://history.google.com/history/lookup?q=&output=rss&num=2000&start=1000 and save as xml (and then change num = 3000 and start = 2000, then 4000 & 3000 etc...you get the idea.) This will work well with 99% of users as they will only have a few pages. Others can use this project. It's relies on automating a user's browser session. Read the wiki to follow the steps needed to do this before using the script.
summary: Guide and Script to Download Google History
